person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: Oh, I get it! Stress can be tough. There's a lovely bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will share his calming techniques to help you relax and focus. Let’s go see him!
